ns2:testcase.ns3:title: Step 1 - Generate Account List files
ns2:testcase.ns3:description:
Step 1 generates the Account List files. These jobs take data from the DB2 database OBBATCH.TMP_ACCTLIST) and translates them into files used in other steps of the batch process. These jobs are run on Staging only - the test environments are not set up to run these, nor are the servers powerful enough to handle the load.
The affiliates are split up between the two servers as follows:
utaxa214: ABT, NBA, NSB, VBC
utaxa215: ZFNB, CBT
If a job fails with a message: "WARN [main] (AccountList.java:134) - Today's file differs from yesterday's file by more than configured threshold of 5.0% !" You'll need to tweak the .previous file so that it more closely mimicks the .finished file. To do this find the .finished file, make a copy of it then edit it by removing a few rows. Finally, rename it as the .previous file, overwriting the existing .previous file. Then, run the job again - it should complete OK.
The files are stored here: /app/dailybatch/s1_batch_processing/finished
To run the job replace '<Bank>' with the bank code: abt, nba, nsb, vbc, zfnb or cbt. Replace <Account Type> with dda, crl, cdira, coml or ila
Preconditions: Access to run scripts with Putty on utaxa214 & utaxa215 is required. You also need WinSCP so you can view files.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: rationalmigration
